snippet: The federal government plans to sell leases for wind farms off the coasts of Massachusetts, Rhode Island and Virginia, officials said Friday.
abstract: Federal government plans to sell leases for wind farms off coasts of Massachusetts, Rhode Island and Virginia.
lead_paragraph: The federal government plans to sell leases for wind farms off the coasts of Massachusetts, Rhode Island and Virginia, officials said Friday.

headline.seo: Government to Sell Wind Farm Leases on East Coast
headline.main: Federal Government to Sell Wind Farm Leases
headline.print_headline: Government To Sell Wind Farm Leases
